🧠 AI needs decentralization more than humans do — here’s why. As AI gets smarter, it also gets hungrier: for data, compute, and storage. Centralized clouds can’t scale forever they’re expensive, vulnerable, and controlled by a handful of companies. But what if AI ran on a decentralized, community-powered network instead? On Functionland, AI could: ⚡ Run without single points of failure 🔐 Process data privately, at the edge 🌍 Scale using community-owned storage & compute 💸 Reduce operational cost dramatically. The future of AI isn’t centralization, it’s collaboration. And it starts with decentralized infrastructure. #Functionland #Web3Storage #DecentralizedAI #Web3Future #OwnYourData #AIR

Better setup. Better stability. Update your FxBlox today. 🧩🚀 #fxblox #functionland #upgrade #newfeatures 👇👇 Dear community, We have published a new update that addresses two important issues that FxBlox owners were facing. Please read this guide carefully if you are facing these issues: 1. Connection to Metamask Not Working (or Preference for Other Wallets) We have added off-chain signatures to the FxBlox setup. During the initial setup, on the "Link Password" screen, instead of "Sign with Metamask," you can now choose "Sign Manually."
